meanings.definition: to perform a figure skating jump with a takeoff from the back inside edge of one skate and a landing on the back outside edge of the other skate.
meanings.sent1: She lutzes gracefully across the ice rink.
meanings.sent2: The skater practiced her lutzes diligently to improve her routine.
meanings.sent3: During the competition, he attempted a triple lutzes but stumbled comically.
meanings.sent4: Her performance was like a series of lutzes, each one more breathtaking than the last.
meanings.sent5: The audience gasped in awe as she executed a flawless lutzes.

meanings.definition: plural form of lutz, a figure skating jump.
meanings.sent1: The skaters included several lutzes in their routine.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered as the skater landed a perfect series of lutzes.
meanings.sent3: The coach reminded the team to focus on their lutzes during practice.
meanings.sent4: The ice seemed to whisper secrets as the skater soared through the air in a lutzes.
meanings.sent5: The judges were impressed by the height of her lutzes.
